attributes.action: compel broadband providers to offer a service to all rural communities in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Statistics for broadband availability in the UK focus on the number of exchanges capable of providing the service.

This completely obscures the fact that a large number of people remain unable to access an affordable broadband service because of their location.

We urge the Prime Minister and OFCOM to create and enforce a requirement that broadband providers must supply a broadband (minimum 512kbps) service to rural communities, in the same way that bus and rail franchisees are compelled to provide services on otherwise uneconomical routes.
